A Hitchhiker's Guide to
Complex Geometry

Hitchhiker guide's to Complex Geometry

This reading group is composed by a series of lectures and reknowned invited speakers that aims to better understand Complex Geometry, and foster cross-field interactions between physicists, geometers and machine learners.
Everyone is welcome to attend!
